keyMoments.title: Minotaurus Debuts
keyMoments.description: Minotaurus, the first Jailer Beast, appears and confronts Luffy and Bentham on Level 3 of Impel Down. The massive creature resembles a muscular humanoid cow carrying a large spiked club.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a Jailer Beast and the first awakened Zoan Devil Fruit user in the series, though this fact is not revealed until later.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Luffy and Bentham
keyMoments.description: Minotaurus demonstrates overwhelming power by attacking Luffy and Bentham with tremendous force, landing several hits with his massive club.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the incredible strength and durability of the Jailer Beasts, proving to be a formidable challenge even for Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Teamwork
keyMoments.description: Minotaurus is finally defeated through the combined efforts of Luffy, Bentham, Buggy, and Galdino using coordinated attacks.
keyMoments.significance: First Jailer Beast defeated, demonstrating that these powerful guardians can be overcome with strategy and cooperation.

abilities.description: As a failed awakened Zoan user, Minotaurus possesses incredible durability and the ability to recover quickly from injuries, though he has lost his human consciousness to the beast.
Minotaurus wields a massive spiked club with tremendous force, capable of devastating attacks.

reveals.information: First Jailer Beast introduced in the series
